document_data.caption: A map showing Realm Street in east Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Realm Street
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Realm Street''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Realm Street was located in east Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The road originated near the outer eastern wall at [[Border Street]] and moved west through the city to terminate at the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]. Realm Street was intersected by [[Black Street]], [[Beholder Street]], [[Star Street (Zhentil Keep)|Star Street]], [[Battle Way]], and the [[Street of Sorrow]].
document_data.Notable Locations: Prominent locations along Beholder Street included [[Joseph's Locks]] and several barracks for the [[Zhentilar]].
